name: Bear Quest
description:
tek(@tek256)

source code

Henry the bear is on a quest to avenge his family! He must stab the one that took his family. The pope! Play as Henry on his quest to Stab the Pope. (Not the cool pope)

Controls:

  • W/D Left/Right - Movement
  • Z - Attack
  • X - Block

Note: This game is still in development, full release will be a paid version!
